segments.text: Good morning . Sanyu Restaurant . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What time do you open this evening ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I'd like to reserve a table for two .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . What time would you like your table , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure , perhaps around 8 pm .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine ! I'll reserve a table for two at 8 pm , sir . May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , any chance of a table by the window ? My wife loves the bird's eye view . As it's her birthday , I want it to be a celebration .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . We have already received many bookings and though I can't guarantee anything , please be assured that we'll try our best , Mr . Davis . I hope you'll understand .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do , but I would appreciate you , if it could be arranged .
segments.speaker: S2
